sentences.en: a refuse dump
sentences.cn: 垃圾场

sentences.en: Families want the right to refuse life support.
sentences.cn: 病人亲属要求有权拒绝使用机器维持生命。

sentences.en: Go on, ask her; she can hardly refuse.
sentences.cn: 去吧，去求她，她不大会拒绝。

sentences.en: His sense of decency and fair play made him refuse the offer.
sentences.cn: 他的正直感和公平竞争意识使他拒绝了这一提议.

sentences.en: I absolutely refuse to get married.
sentences.cn: 我决不结婚。

sentences.en: I refuse to act that way when my kids fight.
sentences.cn: 我的孩子们打起架来时，我不会那样做。

sentences.en: I've always had a loud mouth, I refuse to be silenced.
sentences.cn: 我一贯大声说出自己的想法，不会迫于压力而一言不发。

sentences.en: It never occurred to me that he would refuse.
sentences.cn: 我从没想到他会不肯.

sentences.en: It would have been impolitic to refuse his offer.
sentences.cn: 当时若拒绝了他的好意当然是不明智的。

sentences.en: James, I should refuse that consultancy with Shapiro, if I were you.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯，如果我是你，我就会拒绝向夏皮罗咨询。

sentences.en: Officials refuse to divulge details of the negotiations.
sentences.cn: 官员们拒绝透露谈判的细节。

sentences.en: refuse collection
sentences.cn: 垃圾收集

sentences.en: She asked him to leave, but he refused.
sentences.cn: 她叫他走，但他不肯。

sentences.en: She had made us an offer too good to refuse.
sentences.cn: 她开出的条件好得让我们难以回绝。

sentences.en: Stratford police refuse to comment on whether anyone has been arrested.
sentences.cn: 斯特拉福德警方拒绝对是否已有人被捕一事发表任何评论。

sentences.en: The town made a weekly collection of refuse.
sentences.cn: 该镇每周收一次垃圾。

sentences.en: They refuse to do anything about the real cause of crime: poverty.
sentences.cn: 他们拒绝采取措施解决引发犯罪的真正问题：贫穷。

sentences.en: Those who refuse to repent, he said, will be punished.
sentences.cn: 那些拒不悔改的人，他说，将会受到惩罚。

sentences.en: When he offered all that money, I could hardly refuse (= could not refuse ) , could I?
sentences.cn: 他愿意给那么多钱，我怎么可能拒绝呢？

sentences.en: You were quite within your rights to refuse to co-operate with him.
sentences.cn: 你完全有权拒绝跟他合作。

words.tran_cn: 拒绝；优先取舍权；推却；取舍权

phrases.tran_cn: 垃圾转运站；废物转运站

trans.tran_en: waste material that has been thrown away
to say firmly that you will not do something that someone has asked you to do
